meanings.definition: A large body of matter with no definite shape.
meanings.sent1: The scientist studied the massas of clay in the lab.

meanings.sent1: The concert was so popular that a massas of fans gathered outside the venue.

meanings.definition: To gather or form into a mass.
meanings.sent1: The chef began to massas the ingredients together to make the dough.
